alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 19 at 12:02PM MDT until April 20 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 24 inches, with highest accumulations in the mountains and adjacent north and west slopes and plains. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap, and Fergus County below 4500ft. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains
